test.subject: english
test.name: Tiếng Anh 12 - Unit 8: The World of Work
test.description: Chủ đề Công việc. Ngữ pháp: Câu tường thuật (Reported Speech) và Động từ khuyết thiếu (Modal Verbs).

questions.question: Mark the letter A, B, C, or D to indicate the word whose underlined part differs from the other three in pronunciation.
questions.explanation: Đáp án A 'resume' (sơ yếu lý lịch) thường đọc là /rez.jʊˈmeɪ/ (âm cuối là /eɪ/). Các từ còn lại âm e cuối câm hoặc đọc khác.

questions.question: Mark the letter A, B, C, or D to indicate the word that differs from the other three in the position of primary stress.
questions.explanation: Đáp án D 'position' nhấn âm 2. Các từ còn lại nhấn âm 1.

questions.question: She decided to apply ______ the position of marketing manager.
questions.explanation: Cấu trúc 'apply for a job/position' (nộp đơn xin việc).

questions.question: A ______ is a brief account of a person's education, qualifications, and previous experience.
questions.explanation: 'CV' (Curriculum Vitae) là bản sơ yếu lý lịch tóm tắt.

questions.question: He asked me ______ I had previous experience in sales.
questions.explanation: Câu tường thuật dạng Yes/No question dùng 'if' hoặc 'whether'.

questions.question: The interviewer told the candidate ______ down.
questions.explanation: Câu tường thuật mệnh lệnh: 'tell sb to do sth'.

questions.question: Candidates must have good ______ skills to work effectively in a team.
questions.explanation: 'Interpersonal skills' là kỹ năng giao tiếp/ứng xử giữa các cá nhân.

questions.question: Before being hired officially, you usually have to undergo a ______ period.
questions.explanation: 'Probation period' là thời gian thử việc.

questions.question: Closest meaning: He was 'sacked' because of his poor performance.
questions.explanation: 'Sacked' (bị sa thải) đồng nghĩa với 'dismissed' hoặc 'fired'.

questions.question: Opposite meaning: It is a 'challenging' job, but very rewarding.
questions.explanation: 'Challenging' (đầy thách thức/khó khăn) trái nghĩa với 'easy'.

questions.question: She said that she ______ for a new job then.
questions.explanation: Tường thuật lùi thì: Hiện tại tiếp diễn -> Quá khứ tiếp diễn. 'Then' thay cho 'now'.

questions.question: You ______ be late for the interview, or you will lose the chance.
questions.explanation: 'Mustn't' chỉ sự cấm đoán (không được phép muộn).

questions.question: The company decided to ______ new staff next month.
questions.explanation: 'Recruit' (tuyển dụng).

questions.question: My boss has high ______ of his employees.
questions.explanation: 'High expectations' (kỳ vọng cao).

questions.question: Communication: 'When will I know the result?' - '______'
questions.explanation: Câu trả lời tiêu chuẩn trong phỏng vấn xin việc.

questions.question: Identify mistake: 'He said me that he was busy.'
questions.explanation: Dùng 'said to me' hoặc 'told me'. Không dùng 'said me'. Chọn A sửa thành 'told'.

questions.question: To get this job, you need a university ______.
questions.explanation: 'University degree' (bằng đại học).

questions.question: We are looking for a ______ candidate who is reliable and honest.
questions.explanation: 'Trustworthy' (đáng tin cậy).

questions.question: Transformation: '"I will finish the report tomorrow," Tom said.' -> Tom said that...

options.text: he would finish the report the next day.
he will finish the report tomorrow.
he finished the report the next day.
he would finish the report tomorrow.

questions.explanation: Lùi thì (will -> would) và đổi trạng từ (tomorrow -> the next day).

questions.question: Flexible working hours can help employees achieve a better ______ balance.
questions.explanation: 'Work-life balance' (cân bằng giữa công việc và cuộc sống).
